links.title: 5 Signs of a Stock Market Top - Cabot Wealth Network
links.description: The long-term trend of the market is up, and always has been, according to the century-plus chart on my wall. But in that long-term trend are periods of bull-market strength-like last year's-and periods of bear-market weakness-like the very difficult stretch we had in 2015 and early 2016.
